description: RDI at 3% desaturation  [(total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 3% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + canbp3 + canop3 +oarbp3 +oarop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 + marbp3 + marop3 + manrbp3 + manrop3) / slpprdp
